Translations.Text: Err awal iw, d win n tidep, i ineggura
Err iyi si lweooat n Loennet n ssuaada
Semmee i baba. Neppa, s tidep, illa seg im$eooqen
Ur iyi Xezzu, ass n tnekra nnsen
ass ideg ur infaa wayla, ne$ derya
siwa win iqublen Oebbi, s wul unuie
A d teppae Loennet, ar wid ipeezziben
A d innunnet ujajie ar im$eooqen
Ad asen inin: "anda ten wid tellam taabdem
war Oebbi? Day a kwen ssellken, ne$ ad ssellken iman nnsen
Ad pwagren degs, nitni, akked wid i$elien
akked laaskeo n Iblis, akken ma llan
Ad inin; u nitni, degs, ppemqellaan
s Oebbi, ar nella di ttelfan n uuee
mi kwen nessaadel ar Mass imavalen
D ibe$wviyen kan i a$ itelfen
Ur nesai imcafaen
ne$ aebib i $ ieemmlen
Lemmer ad as nales, a nili d lmumnin
Deg wayagi, s tidep, assekni. Tegwti, degsen, ur uminen
Mass ik, s tidep, Neppa, d Uzmir, Ipeunu
Agdud n Nue iskaddeb imazanen
Mi sen inna gmat sen Nue: "day ur tepeezzibem ara
Nek, $uowen, d amazan muman
Ihi, eezzbet i Oebbi, ta$em iyi awal
Ur awen ssutre$ kra n teqdiat, ilmend n waya. Ih, taqdiat iw, apan kan, ar Mass imavalen
Ihi, eezzbet i Oebbi, ta$em iyi awal
Nnan: "day a k namen, mi ddan yidek imezwura n laaouo
